Categorical normalization

{% raw %}

cat_normalize[source]

cat_normalize(cf, cat_arrays, cat_idx:int, hard:bool=False)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from cfnet.datasets import TabularDataModule

dm = TabularDataModule(data_configs)
cf = random.normal(random.PRNGKey(0), (10, 29))
cf_norm = cat_normalize(cf, dm.cat_arrays, dm.cat_idx, True)
cat_feats = len(dm.cat_arrays)

assert all(jnp.sum(cf_norm[:, dm.cat_idx:], axis=-1) == cat_feats)
{% endraw %}
